article_title: Turmoil in Medicare Advantage hits North Carolina seniors hard
article_text: North Carolina senior citizens who choose private Medicare policies are seeing an unusual level of turmoil this year, with more than 57,000 notified their plans won’t be offered in 2015.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Medicare Advantage, Blue Cross Blue Shield, Kaiser Family Foundation, North Carolina rate hikes
article_metadata.title: Turmoil in Medicare Advantage hits North Carolina seniors hard | The Charlotte Observer
